summary: For anon...reader is Leia’s best friend as requested and is entirely a different color. Enjoy! Y/N threw her arms around the...
caption:
For anon…reader is Leia’s best friend as requested and is entirely a different color. Enjoy!

Y/N threw her arms around the princess, ignoring all social graces. The recently freed princess couldn’t help but to smile at her best friend.

“You’re alright!” Y/N expressed, “I mean, I knew you would be, but still, you make me worry.”
Leia chuckled. “If I had known you were with Ben Kenobi, I would’ve gotten here sooner.”

Y/N smirked. Their reunion was cut short as Han scoffed.

“Yeah, we’re not trying to sneak out or anything.”

Y/N scrunched her nose in a way that would equate to eye rolling. Luke, on the other hand, was cocking his head to the side in cute curiosity. Though he had been hesitant when he first met her, the Skywalker was greatly warming up to Y/N. 

The group of four started heading toward the ship they had come in. Y/N’s ears flicked in glee when she smiled over at Leia.

“I really worried you, didn’t I?” the princess inquired.
She nodded. “Yeah. I just…this is a war.”

The pair paused when underneath the ship. Leia gripped Y/N’s hand with a comforting smile.

“We both live to see another day,” she soothed.
Y/N nodded.

A skirmish caught her attention, causing her to raise her blaster and shoot at their enemies. A smirk grew upon her features.

“Let’s make it a double.”

A small chuckle caused her to glance over to Luke. The blond was smiling at her. A quiet blush colored her cheeks as she continued to shoot.

“She’s such a cutie,” Luke thought to himself.

Perma-tags: @beeeeeeeeeeeeeeeep @heeyeonni @caitsymichelle13 @myplaceofthingsilove @bestillmystuckyheart @littlestfangirl @frostbyte-horan @anali-022506 @krylo-rxn @ilovetvshowsblog @yllwtaxi @mimikyu-of-death @happy-days-22
Semi-tags: @bi-shy-and-ready-to-die @michaelathewordsmith

summary: Requested by anon “I can see why Poe talks about you all the time..” You liked Finn from the first meeting. A nice person. A...
caption:
Requested by anon

“I can see why Poe talks about you all the time..” You liked Finn from the first meeting. A nice person. A good person. Someone who pushed past the bad to be good even when it was difficult. Yeah, he was a good one.

summary: DARTH VADER #24 CHARLES SOULE (W) • GIUSEPPE CAMUNCOLI (A) Cover by GIUSEPPE CAMUNCOLI & ELIA BONETTI “FORTRESS VADER” – PART 6...
caption:
DARTH VADER #24

CHARLES SOULE (W) • GIUSEPPE CAMUNCOLI (A)
Cover by GIUSEPPE CAMUNCOLI & ELIA BONETTI
“FORTRESS VADER” – PART 6
The FORTRESS will stand, but at a terrible cost.
The fire will come to MUSTAFAR, and all will burn.
The final design is revealed, woven from war, treachery and pain.
32 PGS./Rated T …$3.99
